casebody.data:
EATMON
v.
TOWN OF BAILEY et al. No. 653P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. Scott C. Hart, New Bern, for Town of Bailey.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2004 by Plaintiff to Rehear Denial En Banc (Reconsideration Motion From Denial on Appeal of North Carolina Court of Appeals):

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of April 2004."
